mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ooe.ID) AMOUNT, osl.`NAME` AS NAME FROM `opm_order_ext` ooe LEFT JOIN opm_order oo ON ooe.ORDER_ID = oo.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN opm_customer oc ON oo.CMP_CUSTOMER_ID = oc.ID LEFT JOIN opm_service_info osi ON ooe.SERVICE_INFO_ID = osi.ID LEFT JOIN opm_service_list osl ON osi.CMP_SERVICE_LIST_ID = osl.ID WHERE ooe.`STATUS` = 6 AND oc.REG_SOURCE IN (1,2) AND osl.`NAME` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY osl.`NAME` ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 16
